title: Beats by Dre x Richard Sherman: Hear What You Want Commercia
description:
Distractions kill your focus. So Richard Sherman wears Beats by Dre Studio Wireless to stay in the zone. Watch him silence his critics in the full "Hear What You Want" director's cut by Noah Marshall.

ADAPTIVE NOISE CANCELLATION

Track: "The Man" 
Artist: Aloe Blacc 

Playing Music—Sound quality and noise cancellation are balanced
Music Off—The level of noise cancellation rises to deliver a complete noise cancellation experience
Uses battery power


Track: "The Man" 
Artist: Aloe Blacc
